root.name: Dynasty Warriors 7: Empires
root.description: OverviewDynasty Warriors 7: Empires is the second stand-alone expansion to Koei's Dynasty Warriors 7. As in previous Empires releases, the game will take the Dynasty Warriors style of action gameplay and merge it with a more strategic element as the player attempts to unify all of China under their rule. Unlike Dynasty Warriors 7 and its first expansion, Xtreme Legends, Empires is a PS3 exclusive. In North America, it is a digital-only release.
